q1.question: How long does implementation take?
q1.answer: Most implementations take 2-4 weeks, depending on complexity. We handle the entire setup process, including integration with your existing systems, staff training, and ongoing support.

q2.answer: Absolutely. We are fully compliant with the Hong Kong Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (PDPO). All data is encrypted and stored in Hong Kong data centers. We never share your data with third parties.

q3.question: Do I need technical expertise to use Aitivate?
q3.answer: No technical knowledge is required. Our solutions are designed for business users with an intuitive interface. We provide comprehensive training and continuous support for your team.

q4.question: Does Aitivate integrate with my existing software?

q5.question: What is the pricing model?
